channel.title: pine needles on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in pine needles on Barefoot Rob

item.title: SOGO Cookie Time
item.description: Sunday 10 June 2018 (written 21:42 Wednesday 13 June 2018 JST) This past weekend after SOGO (only like 12 people attended because it was sprinkling for part of the time) we went to Cookie Time, and oh my god I can imagine how bad it is for me because of how good they taste. I will probably go back next week, esp if Aki comes to SOGO; she also loves sweets.
